name: This is Sparta!
description:
Download the game for a better experience! 

(Performance  of the physics sim is not that great in the HTML5 build)

Persian archers brought the crowns and heads of conquered kings to your city steps. They insulted your queen. They threatened your people with slavery and death.

You will shown them their place.

Is this blasphemy? Is this madness?

No, THIS IS SPARTA!

Controls

Click to aim and kick

Credit

Pixel art by beenbaba

Coding by da Finnci

Assets used

Music by Matthew Pablo https://opengameart.org/content/the-fall-of-arcana-new-era-version

Cracking sounds by Varkalandar https://opengameart.org/content/cracking-sounds
